premiere_pro.title: Premiere Pro
premiere_pro.description: Best app for making videos shine, from social clips to feature films. Create everything from social clips to feature films with the leading video editor. Create fabulous videos, whether you started with a camera or your phone. Automatically turn dialogue into captions - no more transcribing. Easily resize your videos to fit every screen. Professional video and film editing.
details: Individual Product Plans: 7-day free trial. US$22.99/mo for the annual paid monthly plan.

student.plan: **Students and teachers:** Try this app and 20+ others in Creative Cloud All Apps for just US$19.99/mo for the first year, then US$34.99/mo. Annual paid monthly plan. [See terms](https://www.adobe.com/offer-terms/ccm-ste-introductory.html).

after_effects.title: After Effects
after_effects.description: Best app for making animated graphics, visual effects, and titles. Easily add titles, transitions, and more to your movies with the visual effects and motion graphics app the pros use. Create scrolling movie titles, mood-setting intros, and transitions. Start from scratch, or let us help. Mix it up - change a scene's setting for an entirely new look. Catch more eyes by animating characters, objects, and logos in your videos. Create motion graphics and visual effects for film, TV, video, and web.
details: Individual Product Plans: 7-day free trial. US$22.99/mo for the annual paid monthly plan.

audition.title: Audition
audition.description: Best app for adding sound effects to video and audio projects. Create, mix, and add sound effects to your movies, social posts, and podcasts. Create and mix your own sound effects, from the subtle to the extreme. Pack more punch into your podcasts and audio projects with handy filters and effects. Polish audio tracks for all of your video projects so they sound as good as they look. Audio recording, mixing, and restoration.
details: Individual Product Plans: 7-day free trial. US$22.99/mo for the annual paid monthly plan.

illustrator.title: Illustrator
illustrator.description: Industry-leading graphic design app for custom, scalable vector creations with new generative AI features. Create beautiful designs, icons, and more with precise tools and generative AI. Design logos, icons, packaging, web graphics, and so much more. Share your message. Take your flyer or poster graphics from digital to print with ease. With powerful new features, create graphics that match your style, explore dozens of options, and finish designs in record time. Create precise designs, Illustrations, and vector graphics on desktop and iPad.
details: Individual Product Plans: 7-day free trial. US$22.99/mo for the annual paid monthly plan.

student.plan: **Students and teachers:** Try this app and 20+ others in Creative Cloud All Apps for just US$19.99/mo for the first year, then US$34.99/mo. Annual paid monthly plan. [See terms](https://www.adobe.com/offer-terms/ccm-ste-introductory.html).

photoshop.title: Photoshop
photoshop.description: Best app for creating images, graphics, and art with powerful tools and generative AI. Create gorgeous images and incredible art with amazing tools and generative AI. Create a composite of two or more images by placing them on their own independent, transparent layers. Make complex edits in a flash with the most advanced Generative Fill yet. Plus, use Generative Expand to extend your image with new content. Use the Remove Tool to make large objects disappear and fill the space with content that seamlessly matches the background. Create beautiful graphics, photos, and art on desktop, web, and iPad. Comes with Adobe Fresco for drawing and painting.
details: Individual Product Plans: 7-day free trial. US$22.99/mo for the annual paid monthly plan.

student.plan: **Students and teachers:** Try this app and 20+ others in Creative Cloud All Apps for just US$19.99/mo for the first year, then US$34.99/mo. Annual paid monthly plan. [See terms](https://www.adobe.com/offer-terms/ccm-ste-introductory.html).

acrobat_pro.title: Acrobat Pro
acrobat_pro.description: Best app for editing, converting, and e-signing PDFs, now available with Acrobat AI Assistant add-on. Create, edit, sign, and manage your PDFs - quickly, easily, anywhere. Ask your doc questions with the AI Assistant add-on, available at checkout. Summarize readings with a click. Get quick insights and create study guides or quiz questions based on your content. Add Acrobat AI Assistant at checkout. Easily fix text and swap images without jumping to another app. All it takes is a few clicks. Turn your PDF into a different file type and vice versa. Converting file types is simple and easy with Acrobat.
details: Individual Product Plans: 7-day free trial. US$19.99/mo for the annual paid monthly plan.

lightroom.description: Best app for editing photos from anywhere with help from generative AI. Edit photos from anywhere with easy controls and create the look you want with generative AI. Remove anything in a touch with Generative Remove, powered by Adobe Firefly generative AI. Quickly find the best filter for your image with Adaptive Presets. Choose from portrait, sky, and subject presets for the perfect look. Use sliders and filters to easily create images that will dazzle and delight. Edit, organize, store, and share photos from anywhere.
details: Individual Product Plans starting at US$11.99/mo

substance_3d_stager.description: Compose and render 3D scenes in your own virtual studio with help from generative AI. Compose and render state-of-the-art 3D scenes with generative AI in your own virtual studio. Assemble and stage 3D scenes for visualizations in your own virtual studio. Create the right environment for your scene with Generative Background, powered by Adobe Firefly. Drag and drop 3D assets, materials, lights, and cameras to set up the perfect shot.

substance_3d_painter.description: The industry standard for texturing 3D models in real time. With a real-time viewport, what you see is what you make.
